title: Fix LeaverBuster
body: During a couple of recent games, my wifi has been acting up, making it impossible to play without feeding. As a result, I have been forced to close league, restart my computer, and reopen league. In doing this, I have been put on leaverbuster, despite making it back in the game to help my team. I am essentially being punished as if I got annoyed with my team and quit the game, when in reality, I am going to a certain length to keep playing the game. I'm probably just going to quit playing league if this is not fixed. PLEASE FIX LEAVERBUSTER.

replies.body:
In this situation, Leaverbuster is acting as intended. Regardless of your own intent, your absence from the match negatively impacts **everyone**. This is a key reason as to why the system treats all absences equally and why we're not able to modify the penalties on your account.

You may want to content your ISP's technical support team so they can assist you with figuring out why your WiFi is acting up. You can test any changes they make in a custom match to avoid further penalties. Let me know if you have any questions.

If you guys made the Leave buster time shorter then 20 minutes. I would be more then willing to wait, damn even 10 t0-15 mins would be understandable but still 20 minute wait per game 5 times is a little excessive, would be fine with 3 games but five? I left league for a year because i got so irritated with the leave buster. having to wait an hour in total.
